quests.name: Fishing Expedition
objectives: Find the missing Lucky Fishing Rod in the Meadow.
You found a Broken Fishing Rod! Find the person it belongs to.
Follow Goofy to a fishing spot.
Use the Scrooge McDuck sign to reopen Goofy's Stall.

quests.name: Give Me a Sign
objectives: Make sure you have the Goofy's Stall Sign in your Inventory.
Bring the Goofy's Stall Sign to Goofy.
Follow Goofy to his Stall in Ancient's Landing.

Gather the materials for Goofy around Ancient's Landing:
  ‧ Fish for 12 Plastic Scrap in the waters without ripples.
  ‧ Mine for 25 Copper in rocks.
Unlock Goofy's Stall in Ancient's Landing by interacting with the Scrooge McDuck Sign beside it.
